Name: [Tenacity] Distress Radio
Desc: Increases the stack limit of Instinct from 5 to <color=#2BAD00>10</color>, with each stack increasing the Daze caused by the Agent by <color=#2BAD00>4%</color>. The threshold for the [Compass] Resonium not losing HP is increased to <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>.
Desc2: Even if all that's received is static, it's still a comfort. As long as there's power, there's hope.
